onboarding.page1Body: Never miss a message! Stream sermons in Full HD or download them for offline listening. Whether you're commuting, at the gym, or traveling, take our weekly messages with you wherever you go.
onboarding.page2Body: Access the complete English Standard Version (ESV) Bible powered by YouVersion. Read, search, and explore scripture with an intuitive interface designed for daily devotion and study.
onboarding.page3Body: Get the latest church announcements, upcoming events, and community updates. Connect with our team, submit prayer requests, and stay engaged with everything happening at Thrive Community Church.
onboarding.page4Body: Easily find sermons by topic, speaker, or series. Use powerful search and filtering tools to discover messages that speak to your current season and spiritual journey.
onboarding.page5Body: You're all set! Dive in and experience everything Thrive has to offer. We're excited to have you join our community and grow in faith together.

smallGroup.heroSubtitle: Small groups are the heart of our church community. It's where real life happens and lasting friendships are made.
smallGroup.communityText: Connect with others who share your faith journey. Small groups provide a place to belong, where you can be yourself and grow together.
smallGroup.growthText: Study the Bible together, discuss life's big questions, and deepen your understanding of God's Word in an interactive setting.
smallGroup.supportText: Life is better together. Share your joys and struggles with people who care, pray for one another, and walk through life's seasons together.
smallGroup.ctaText: Ready to take the next step? We'd love to help you find the perfect group for you.

serve.heroSubtitle: Use your gifts and talents to make a difference. There's a place for everyone to serve at Thrive.
serve.worshipText: Join our worship team as a vocalist or musician. Lead others into the presence of God through music and song.
serve.techText: Serve behind the scenes with sound, lighting, video production, media, graphics, or live streaming.
serve.hospitalityText: Help create a welcoming atmosphere. Serve with coffee and refreshments, guest services, or event setup and teardown.
serve.ushersText: Be the first smile people see. Welcome guests, help with seating, assist with offering, and ensure everyone feels at home.
serve.ctaText: Ready to serve? Let us know your interests and we'll help you find the perfect fit.
serve.emailBody:
Hi!

I'm interested in serving at Thrive. Please let me know about the opportunities available and how I can get involved.

Thank you!

imNew.heroSubtitle: We get it—new places can feel awkward. Here's what to expect.
imNew.introLead: Church shouldn't feel like a performance you're not dressed for. At Thrive, we're just regular people figuring out life, faith, and everything in between—together.
imNew.introText: Whether you're exploring faith for the first time, coming back after years away, or just looking for a community that actually feels like community—you're welcome here. No strings attached.

faq.vibeText: Relaxed and real. Grab a coffee when you arrive (it's free), find a seat anywhere you're comfortable, and enjoy music that actually sounds good. Our messages are practical—stuff you can actually use in your week. The whole thing wraps up in about an hour.
faq.dressText: Whatever you want. Seriously. Jeans and a t-shirt? Perfect. Dressed up because you came from brunch? Also perfect. Our pastor usually rocks sneakers. We care way more about you being here than what you're wearing.
faq.kidsText: They'll probably have more fun than you. Thrive Kids is designed to be the highlight of their week—age-appropriate teaching, awesome leaders, and activities they actually enjoy. Available for ages 6 months through 5th grade every Sunday.
faq.connectText: Sunday is just the starting point. Every week we hang out at the pastor's house for dinner, games, and good conversation—it's a great low-pressure way to meet people. We also have Home Huddles (small groups) that meet throughout the week.
